bagItemsSentLetter.Lunna: Greetings {0},^^You forgot these items in my bag, I hope I did not miss anything.^Here they are! I hope you have a good day!^^	-{1}
bagItemsSentLetter.Bianka: Hi {0},^^So, your things were with me. I think you forgot to get them back.^Well here they are! Don't lose them again! Good thing I'm a somewhat honest person.^^	-{1}
bagItemsSentLetter.Raphael: Hi {0},^^You kind of forgot your stuff with me haha. It's fine though.^Here they are, I hope they're intact.^^	-{1}
